headline: Why The Narrative Around Norfolk Southern Is Shifting With New Analyst and Merger Developments
summary: Norfolk Southern's consensus analyst price target has been revised slightly downward, now standing at $311.50 compared to the previous $311.63. This minor reduction comes amid ongoing debate among analysts, who are balancing optimism about revenue growth with continued sector headwinds. Stay tuned for insights on how investors can remain informed as the narrative around Norfolk Southern continues to develop.
